channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: $40 Million Yacht That Mysteriously Sank Is Raised From Bottom of Sea
item.description: Investigators are hoping to find clues as to why the Bayesian superyacht sank off the coast of Sicily 10 months ago, killing seven people.

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’s Ex-Assistant Says Mogul Told Staff to ‘Move Like SEAL Team 6’
item.description: Brendan Paul testified that his duties for Sean Combs involved getting drugs, setting up hotel rooms for sexual encounters and handling routine tasks.

item.title: Weight-loss drugs should be first step to prevent heart disease, top cardiology group says
item.description: Millions more Americans should be taking weight-loss drugs to prevent heart disease, according to the American College of Cardiology.

item.title: ‘Whole of Ukraine Is Ours,’ Putin Muses Without Ruling Out Capturing Key City

item.title: Dallas Cowboys cheerleaders have more reason to cheer: They’re getting a 400% pay increase
item.description: Compensation bump revealed in Netflix docuseries.

item.title: Billionaire Telegram founder leaves his $14 billion fortune to the 100+ children he’s fathered—which means $132 million for each lucky Gen Alpha kid

item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says AI can rival someone with a PhD—just weeks after saying it’s ready for entry-level jobs. So what’s left for grads?
item.description: As Amazon, OpenAI and Anthropic bosses warn, entry-level corporate jobs are about to get cut, experts say Gen Z don’t need to panic—yet.

item.title: 2 Hikers Dead, 3 Others Injured After Rockslide in Canada’s Banff National Park
item.description: The hikers were struck by a cascade of sliding rocks on Thursday while traveling along a moderately difficult trail.
